website_summaries.verdict: Worth considering if you are looking for a strong hose reel, but it's not quite as easy to crank and recoil as some competitors.
pros: Versatile mounting and 9 arm positions make it practical for most uses
Solid steel build that includes 3/8 in
x 50 ft. rubber air hose and limited 1-year warranty that adds to its value
cons: The downside of the heavy-duty build is that it's somewhat awkward to install

customer_reviews.title: Not industrial grade. Inconsistent quality.
customer_reviews.text: I want to like this hose reel. That being said, I just filed for my third replacement. On the first unit, within 24hrs the rotator coupling on the side of the unit the hose hooks too broke off. Completely stripped out. Uncounted it, shipped it back. The second unit lasted for several weeks. The hose is printed word th a 300PSI max and my compressor is 150 max. Hose still blew out where rubber meets the stock male threaded coupling. Waiting on my third unit hoping I will get one that will last.
customer_reviews.author: Abntroop

customer_reviews.title: Can't get it warrantied
customer_reviews.text: The locking mechanism that keep the reel from retracting went out within 2 months after installation. I've been trying to get ahold of the manufacturer to get it warranties, but Amazon claims it is past their warranty because I've had it 3 months now. Unless Amazon refunds my money for this defective item and makes it right, I definitely wouldn't recommend purchasing this reel.
customer_reviews.author: Jason L.

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value; very strong spring and hose very flexible. Update: June, 2017: the ratcheting mechanism is still great, with a very strong "pull: however, the hose itself is still fine, but where it attaches to the ferrule for the quick-connects(the side where you attach your tools) has split over time and caused an air leak. Fortunately, I had a new GOODYEAR (red) hose that I replaced it with(not too difficult). However, I am disappointed with the quality of this assembly as I have never experienced this type of failure with any of my other hoses.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce H. Madden

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This broke within the first 30 days. It was used a few time a week.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer2003

customer_reviews.title: After just 2 months of light use the product no ...
customer_reviews.text: After just 2 months of light use the product no longer engages/locks and I have to use a clamp to the keep hose out
customer_reviews.author: Buck Wallace, MD

customer_reviews.title: Just doesn't hold up in daily use
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this. It's probably ok for you to buy and use it yourself at home if your grown up and are careful with your stuff. I bought a few and put them in my auto repair business shop. After about 6 months, every conceivable failure shows up. Retractor on 2 of them, the guide roller - the steel fatigued and completely broke off of the bracket on one of them, hoses...... Probably ok for light duty home use. But they look like they are better than they are.
customer_reviews.author: J. Ruffingsr

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional customer service
customer_reviews.text: Really good quality hose reel, especially for the price. I broke a part on an older hose reel and the dealer provided exceptional customer service to get me a replacement for the part I broke.
customer_reviews.author: GREG

customer_reviews.title: Well made hose reel
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be well made and works great . Installed this in roof of garage, ran a 15 ft hose over towards existing air tank, put quick connect on that connection and now much easier using air tools
customer_reviews.author: Jim C. Titus

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product...very well built
customer_reviews.text: I like the build and quality. Not an easy install because of the weight, but that's good! It isn't going anywhere soon and the rubner hose quality is top notch. The best feature is the ability to unbolt and rotate the mounting bracket so that I can mount it in a hanging position with the hose portal at 90 degrees. This is one one solid unit. Used for home garage.. No air tools just air nozzles and tires inflated and such. Very happy... And I bought mine with slightly damaged packaging for a lower price from Amazon...
customer_reviews.author: Hilton Grizzly Guy

customer_reviews.title: Quality commercial product
customer_reviews.text: Not a name brand but built like a tank. It was a great value and installed perfectly and works so smoothly. Wouldn’t trade it for one double the price
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: its pretty heavy. and the hose is moderately flexible
customer_reviews.text: higher price than harbor freight...works close to a graco,lincoln,aro etc for 1/10 of the price.its pretty heavy.and the hose is moderately flexible.
customer_reviews.author: MAC

customer_reviews.title: Hose is terrible, do not buy if you don't want black marks everywhere from the hose!
customer_reviews.text: Hard parts are nicely finished but the internals are clunky and not smooth and the rubber hose is very poor quality and will leave your hands sticky and black if you touch the hose, will also leave black marks on anything it touches. I would precise a different model of I were to need another one. As it stands I purchased a new hose for this unit locally since I wanted to finish the project over the weekend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son-in-law for Christmas. He loves it! The retractable hose helps keep his work space better organized. Exactly as described by the manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Awesome hose reel. Heavy.
customer_reviews.text: So far this hose reel and hose has been great. Mounted mine high on the wall so it is out of the way. This thing is super heavy, however, so make sure you have some help getting it mounted.
customer_reviews.author: BMR

customer_reviews.title: It was bent up a bit in shipping and I think it could have been packaged a little better.
customer_reviews.text: This reel seems to work fine so far. It was bent up a bit in shipping and I think it could have been packaged a little better. Overall I think it will last a long time because it seems to be well built.
customer_reviews.author: Northwest Indiana

customer_reviews.title: Great hose reel
customer_reviews.text: I mounted this reel on my truck and it works perfect . I looked at alot of other reels and this one was much cheaper than other brands. Cant ask more for the price. Exactly what I wanted. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the field
customer_reviews.text: Nice product and perfect for the farm truck while working on stuff in the field. Seems to be working well and holding up so far.
customer_reviews.author: Midwest

customer_reviews.title: Does the job but a pain to install
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Instructions for installation are useless. Mounting holes are placed behind the hose and you can not access all of them. Mine is mounted using only 3 bolts. Almost only using 2.
customer_reviews.author: matt

customer_reviews.title: Great Value and Construction!
customer_reviews.text: Great Value and Construction! Excellent product for a fraction of the cost. We have 6 of these in our shop that are used daily with no issues!
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Clements

customer_reviews.title: I have to spin manually to rolling and make me feel real bad.
customer_reviews.text: I installed this about 2weeks ago, this machine not rolling up the air hose completely. I have to spin manually to rolling and make me feel real bad.
customer_reviews.author: KJ Jung

customer_reviews.title: does not set itself accept at a single rotation so ...
customer_reviews.text: does not set itself accept at a single rotation so you will need to spend a little time ascertaining the right position for it to "hold". Occasional slows at around 45 degrees in the corner requiring more force or change in position to continue extending. Return works well
customer_reviews.author: George E. Guthrie

customer_reviews.title: 1st one broke where the hose met the male end ...
customer_reviews.text: 1st one broke where the hose met the male end. Ordered a new one. That on broke in the middle.
customer_reviews.author: Dennise Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Make sure all hardware is tight before installing
customer_reviews.text: When it’s working it’s nice. After about 6 months of use the ratchet that keeps the reel locked fell off. I’m currently in the process of getting replacement parts. If that goes well I’d give 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Installation and initial use went fine. In a year will be the true story if the recoil holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Movie Man

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic addition to my shop. No more hoses to trip over lying on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Len L

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality at a very good price. Very heavy duty frame, wheel and hose.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn O.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just like at the gas station of old. Product performs well. Very heavy duty
customer_reviews.author: Storm Jones

customer_reviews.title: Really nice and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: With unit installed on wall, floor is free of hose. Don't know how I lived without all these years. Really nice and sturdy. One person CAN install but much easier if you have a helper and mount on board which can then be mounted on wall.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Rose

customer_reviews.title: Rewind broken
customer_reviews.text: All three that I purchased have broken. The spring loaded catch for the rewind has broken on all three. Owned for two months.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: After only 3 months use it is broken and doesn't wheel the hose back on the drum.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality for the money. A bit tricky to hang but worth it once it's up.
customer_reviews.author: Steven L. Vradenburg

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't purchase
customer_reviews.text: First time pulling out the hose, the spring mechanism failed! First time!!
customer_reviews.author: Lance C.

customer_reviews.title: Love this. It is so convenient to use and ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this. It is so convenient to use and keeps your hose neatly stored and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Paris

customer_reviews.title: Sticky hose. Don't buy for wood working.
customer_reviews.text: It works OK. Letting the hose in slow is a problem, it stops retracting very easily. Most frustrating, though, is that out of the box the entire hose was coated in something sticky that leaves your hands feeling like they're covered in sticky wax or a thick grease. I gave the hose a quick wipe with acetone and my rag turned brown. And the hose is still sticky. I may need to replace the hose because I will use this primarily with wood working tools and I don't want this junk all over my wood. I will not buy another Primefit product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good quality product for the price. I just about went the Harbor Freight way and I'm glad I didn't.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality, heavier than I imagined. Should last the rest of my life.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: and I am really happy with the
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be really well made, and I am really happy with the product
customer_reviews.author: jsrosti

customer_reviews.title: Very good and the price was right.
customer_reviews.text: Unit functions good, mounts easly. Finidh is very goon.Hose fittings are crimped very well.
customer_reviews.author: Vernon C. Stroble

customer_reviews.title: Bent reel
customer_reviews.text: It was damaged in the box when I opened it. But I needed it now got it as straight as possible.sorry cant get pics to go
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Showed up used and broke
customer_reviews.text: Was suppose to be new and working, showed up the spring didn't retract the hose, the base paint was chipped, you could tell it had been bolted down and used somewhere out side of the package with the grease and dust on it. it is on its way back to the seller
customer_reviews.author: Ben Evans

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy, works awesome for normal home use
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, works awesome for normal home use. Keep in mind does not come with a hose to go from the reel to the air compressor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not quite Industrial grade
customer_reviews.text: Nice hose but reel Itself kind of flimsy. It wobbles from side to side but works OK.
customer_reviews.author: Jbills

customer_reviews.title: After a year of use..
customer_reviews.text: It has not given me a problem yet, mounted to ceiling, does the job for a hobbyist, I can say I retract the hose about every other day. Good quality not a $300 reel but for a home shop, perfect
customer_reviews.author: r

customer_reviews.title: This one is would be fine for home use but the recoil spring is not ...
customer_reviews.text: Not what I thought I was buying the reel is very light weight and I will have to purchase another one that is heavier duty. This one is would be fine for home use but the recoil spring is not strong enough.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy D.

customer_reviews.title: Good hose, but the reel broke second time I used it
customer_reviews.text: The hose is good quality but the second time I reeled it in, the spring-reel mechanism broke. Now it wont reel in. It is made from good quality metal that will last a lifetime. Hopefully the reel mechanism is a easy fix because I don't know if I can send it back or not
customer_reviews.author: Tim Wells

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: great heavy duty, no hose to connect to your compressor though
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Components and hose are nice, heavy duty commercial grade material
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this unit for an industrial application and it is indeed heavy duty. Components and hose are nice, heavy duty commercial grade material. Mechanism on reel is smooth and retracts with good force. Only word of caution is that the unit is very heavy and you'll need to consider that when deciding where to mount. Wall anchors will not suffice and will need to be lag bolted in wall studs. I mounted a 2" x 6" spanning a few studs and mounted unit to that to give enough support. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: David

product_meta.title: Primefit HRRUB380503 Industrial Grade Retractable Air Hose Reel with 50-Foot Rubber Air Hose
product_meta.description: Size:1-(Pack)The Prime fit HRRUB380503 industrial grade retractable air hose reel with 50-Foot rubber air hose is great for do-it-yourself projects to professional and industrial applications. The Prime fit retractable air hose reel takes all the work out of coiling and storing air hose in your shop, garage or workplace. This professional-grade, all-steel construction hose reel features a corrosion resistant powder coat finish for added life and increased durability. The hose travel on and off the reel is smoothly guided by a 4-roller guide arm that adjusts to (9) different positions. Select the needed length of hose from the reel while a continuous ratchet gear locks it into place and gets rid of backward tension while you work. Just tug on the hose to unlock, while the automatic rewind feature puts the hose back onto the reel. Conveniently, the reel can be mounted to the ceiling, wall, or floor. The included Prime fit rubber hose is oil and abrasion resistant, and stays comfortable and flexible in the toughest environments, while solid brass end fittings are used to ensure tight, leak-free connections. The Prime fit HRRUB380503 industrial grade retractable air hose reel with 50-Foot rubber air hose comes with a 1-year limited . From do-it-yourself, to professional, to industrial applications, Prime fit delivers. Prime fit has been manufacturing pneumatic accessories, air tools and compressors for over 30 years.
feature_bullets: All-steel construction hose reel features a corrosion resistant powder coat finish for longer life and durability
Comes with a 3/8-inch, 50-foot rubber air hose
Permits wall, ceiling, or floor mounting
Guide arm adjusts to (9) different positions

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars92 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
